HeroSection.title: The
HeroSection.description: MEET provides a seamless, secure, and unlimited experience

FeaturesSection.title: Outstanding advantages of Meet
FeaturesSection.description: Achieve more together – anytime, anywhere – with Meet online meeting software

features.title: Multi-point Connection
features.description: Supports up to 1000 interactive endpoints and Webinar conferences with up to 10,000 participants

features.title: Integration
features.description: Easily integrates with Polycom, Cisco, and other systems

features.title: Cross-platform
features.description: Developed across multiple platforms: Web Application, Mobile App, and Tablet App

features.title: Advanced Features
features.description: Includes features like AI integration, meeting summaries, live translation, and mobile call-in

stats.description: Meet's customers feel very confident that their meetings are safe and secure.

partners.title: Partners - Customers
partners.description: Meet is suitable for all businesses regardless of size, with distributed office systems or needs for internal meetings, partner meetings, and businesses requiring webinars, presentations, or workshops...

features.label: Video Call
features.title: High-quality Video Calls
features.description: Make HD video calls with support for multiple participants at once. This feature enables direct communication, creating a natural and effective connection in online meetings.

features.label: Screen Sharing
features.title: Screen Sharing
features.description: Users can share their screen with others in the meeting. This is very useful for presentations, showcasing information, software tutorials, or collaborating on shared documents.

features.label: Polls & Q&A
features.title: Live Polls & Q&A
features.description: Create live polls and interactive Q&A sessions. Participants can easily ask questions, vote, and share opinions, enhancing engagement during meetings.

features.label: Discussion
features.title: Group Discussion
features.description: Real-time chat and discussion features allow members to exchange ideas, share information, and collaborate effectively throughout the meeting.

features.label: Virtual Background
features.title: Professional Virtual Backgrounds
features.description: Change your background with a variety of virtual options. This feature helps create a professional meeting environment while protecting personal workspace privacy.

features.label: File Sharing
features.title: Document Sharing
features.description: Quickly share and access documents, images, and files. Everyone in the meeting can view, download, and collaborate on shared resources.

features.label: Recording
features.title: Meeting Recording
features.description: Record the entire meeting for later review or for sharing with those who could not attend. This feature ensures that no important information is missed.

features.label: Whiteboard
features.title: Interactive Whiteboard
features.description: Use a digital whiteboard to draw, take notes, and brainstorm together. This tool supports multiple people editing simultaneously, fostering creativity and effective collaboration.

DeviceSection.title: Optimized for all devices
DeviceSection.description: The Meet platform supports most devices, including mobile phones, tablets, laptops, PCs, etc., on popular operating systems such as Windows, iOS, and Android.

TestimonialsSection.title: What customers say about
TestimonialsSection.description: Hear the experiences of customers who trust our product.

faqs.question: What is the MEET online meeting platform?
faqs.answer: MEET is an online meeting platform designed for individuals, businesses, and large corporations to conduct meetings and conferences across multiple locations. With MEET, companies can easily organize internal meetings or meet with partners and clients with just a few steps on the website, without the need to install complex software.

faqs.question: How can I download or access the MEET platform?
faqs.answer:
On computer/web:
Log in directly via the website: meet.mobifone.vn

On mobile:
For iOS devices, go to the App Store. For Android devices, go to Google Play. Search for 'MobiFone Meet' and tap the download icon.

faqs.question: How to fix errors/no sound when joining a meeting on the web?
faqs.answer:
Step 1: On the homepage meet.mobifone.vn, click the lock icon on the URL bar

Step 2: Select Site Settings

Step 3: Find the Sound section and select Allow

Step 4: Reload the homepage

faqs.question: How do I grant microphone and camera permissions on the app?
faqs.answer:
Step 1: On your mobile device, open Settings

Step 2: Select the Meet app

Step 3: Enable Microphone and Camera

Step 4: Open the Meet app and start using it
